controllers.gui

Class Users

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.gui.Users
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    @Singleton
public class Users
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Controller with actions concerning users (incl. user manager)

    • Field Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      play.mvc.Result allUserData()
      GET request: Returns a list of all users as JSON
      play.mvc.Result changePasswordByAdmin(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      Handles POST request from change password form in user manager initiated by an admin
      play.mvc.Result changePasswordByUser(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      Handles POST request from change password form by user themselves
      play.mvc.Result create(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      Handles POST request of user create form.
      play.mvc.Result edit(java.lang.String username)
      Handles POST request of user edit profile form (except password and roles).
      play.mvc.Result profile(java.lang.String username)
      Shows the profile view of a user
      play.mvc.Result remove(java.lang.String usernameOfUserToRemove)
      POST request to delete a user.
      play.mvc.Result singleUserData(java.lang.String username)
      GET request that returns data of the user that belongs to the given username
      play.mvc.Result toggleActive(java.lang.String usernameOfUserToChange, java.lang.Boolean active)
      POST request to activate or deactivate a user.
      play.mvc.Result toggleRole(java.lang.String usernameOfUserToChange, java.lang.String role, boolean value)
      POST request to add or remove a role from a user.
      play.mvc.Result userManager()

      • create

        public play.mvc.Result create(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
                       throws javax.naming.NamingException
        Handles POST request of user create form. Only users with Role ADMIN are allowed to create new users.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException

      • edit

        public play.mvc.Result edit(java.lang.String username)
                     throws JatosGuiException
        Handles POST request of user edit profile form (except password and roles). This POST can come from the user themselves or from an admin user to edit another user.
        Throws:
        JatosGuiException

      • changePasswordByAdmin

                                      throws javax.naming.NamingException

        Throws:

        public play.mvc.Result changePasswordByUser(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
                                     throws javax.naming.NamingException
        Handles POST request from change password form by user themselves
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException

      • remove

        public play.mvc.Result remove(java.lang.String usernameOfUserToRemove)
        POST request to delete a user. Is called from user manager and user profile.

        It can't be a HTTP DELETE because it contains form data and Play doesn't handle body data in a DELETE request.
